short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides customizable content warnings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides content warnings for particular keywords while browsing on various websites. The content warnings are easily customizable. Users can add, remove, and disable different warnings according to their preferences and whatever they find convenient using a simple interface. In case a keyword is found on some website, a pop-up is thrown providing the user with two options: continue browsing or leaving the site.
